URBAN.TITLE: Urban Ward
URBAN.DESCRIPTION: A densely populated area with modern infrastructure, commercial centers, and urban amenities.

SUBURBAN.TITLE: Suburban Ward
SUBURBAN.DESCRIPTION: A residential area on the outskirts of the city, combining urban conveniences with more spacious living.

RURAL.TITLE: Rural Ward
RURAL.DESCRIPTION: An area characterized by agricultural activities, traditional villages, and natural landscapes.

SPECIAL.TITLE: Special Administrative Region
SPECIAL.DESCRIPTION: A unique administrative area with specific economic, historical, or strategic importance.

INDUSTRIAL.TITLE: Industrial Ward
INDUSTRIAL.DESCRIPTION: An area focused on manufacturing, logistics, and industrial activities.

MIXED.TITLE: Mixed Development Ward
MIXED.DESCRIPTION: A diverse area combining residential, commercial, and light industrial activities.
